name: SleepCricketSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Sleep Cricket Sounds”
”Alexa, start Sleep Cricket Sounds”
”Alexa, launch Sleep Cricket Sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep cricket sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Audio application capable of playing relaxing music to fall asleep. Multiple audio tracks are available.



To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.
